testcase.name: testFunctionalMementoInteger
testcase.system-out: FunctionalMemento: Executed - Increment by 5 FunctionalMemento: Executed - Increment by 3 FunctionalMemento: Undo: Increment by 3 FunctionalMemento: Redo: Increment by 3

testcase.name: testMementoPatternBehavior
testcase.system-out: Originator: State set to Original Originator: Saving state to memento Originator: State set to Changed Originator: State restored from memento to Original FunctionalMemento: Executed - Append: End FunctionalMemento: Undo: Append: End RecordMemento: State set - State updated RecordMemento: State set - State updated RecordMemento: Undo to - State updated StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - Initial state (id: initial) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Restored state from tag: Initial state

testcase.name: testStreamMemento
testcase.system-out: StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - Initial state (id: initial) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - First checkpoint (id: checkpoint1) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - Second checkpoint (id: checkpoint2) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Restored state from id: checkpoint1 StreamMemento: Restored state from tag: Second checkpoint

testcase.name: testStreamMementoFiltering
testcase.system-out: StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - Initial state (id: initial) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - tag1 (id: s1) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - tag2 (id: s2) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - tag1 (id: s3) StreamMemento: Kept only latest 2 snapshots

testcase.name: testEquivalence
testcase.system-out: Originator: State set to Test Originator: Saving state to memento Originator: State set to Changed Originator: State restored from memento to Test FunctionalMemento: Executed - Append: Changed FunctionalMemento: Undo: Append: Changed RecordMemento: State set - State updated RecordMemento: State set - State updated RecordMemento: Undo to - State updated StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - Initial state (id: initial) StreamMemento: Snapshot saved - State updated (id: auto) StreamMemento: Restored state from tag: Initial state

testcase.name: testFunctionalMemento
testcase.system-out: FunctionalMemento: Executed - Append: World FunctionalMemento: Executed - Append: ! FunctionalMemento: Undo: Append: ! FunctionalMemento: Undo: Append: World FunctionalMemento: Redo: Append: World

testcase.name: testTraditionalMemento
testcase.system-out: Originator: State set to State1 Originator: Saving state to memento Caretaker: Memento saved (total: 1) Originator: State set to State2 Originator: Saving state to memento Caretaker: Memento saved (total: 2) Originator: State set to State3 Originator: State restored from memento to State2 Originator: State restored from memento to State1

testcase.name: testFunctionalMementoUndoRedo
testcase.system-out: FunctionalMemento: Executed - Increment by 5 FunctionalMemento: Undo: Increment by 5 FunctionalMemento: Redo: Increment by 5

testcase.name: testRecordMementoHistory
testcase.system-out: RecordMemento: State set - First RecordMemento: State set - Second RecordMemento: State set - Third

testcase.name: testRecordMemento
testcase.system-out: RecordMemento: State set - Setup RecordMemento: State set - Update RecordMemento: Undo to - Setup RecordMemento: Redo to - Update

testcase.name: testCareTakerBehavior
testcase.system-out: Originator: State set to State1 Originator: Saving state to memento Caretaker: Memento saved (total: 1) Originator: State set to State2 Originator: Saving state to memento Caretaker: Memento saved (total: 2) Originator: State restored from memento to State1
